nodes.text: A female individual was the mother of male historian and Resistance member Beaumont Kin. In 5 BBY, the mother gave birth to Kin. During the First Order blockade of the planet Kashyyyk, Kin claimed to Daz Crano that his parents told him he was useless, which is why he refused to follow his future and join the Resistance in their war against the First Order.

Beaumont Kin's mother was mentioned in "Ghosts of Kashyyyk, Part 1" which is a comic story in the 27th issue of the 2017 anthology comic series Star Wars Adventures. The comic story was written by John Barber, illustrated by Derek Charm, and published on October 30, 2019.
